duties_responsibilities.duty: Serve as the point of contact with customers, directing and making decisions regarding the repair process from beginning to end.
Manage inventory, work independently, and work closely with body shops and others to negotiate repair pricing and assess liability.
Complete vehicle inspections, write estimates, determine total loss evaluations, and negotiate the repair process with body shops.
Document claim-related information, make decisions consistent with claims standards and local laws, and evaluate and handle claim payments.
Review and determine the validity of any supplement requests.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or higher and at least one year of automotive, appraisal/estimatics, or insurance experience. Valid driver’s license, auto insurance, and compliance with company's driving standards and/or policies.
